channel.title: Please help me host my server
channel.description: i need help with making it so ppl can connect to my server i have my no-ip and everytime i mess with my enviorment varieables it messes up my java i do it just like i shuld with the classpath and path but everytime i put the code in i cant run my java anymore suggestions would be helpfull thank you for your time

item.title: Please help me host my server
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Try finding a new run.batch, and a new compiler, that may help.

Read full topic

Hope it helps you some more!
